dialogs.buttonText: What are you doing in this cave?
dialogs.responseText: Oh I'm just, you know, enjoying the damp darkness.
It is! but at least no one can see my face down here.
It's just so ugly! Us gnomes are renowned for our good looks, at least among ourselves. But me? I don't fit the stereotype at all!

dialogs.buttonText: Would you like to join me on my adventure?
dialogs.responseText: I really would, but I just can't leave the cave looking the way I do.
